ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Applied to an ECClass to indicate that a subclass of DgnDomain::Handler will be supplied for it at run-time.

ECArrayProperty.description: List of actions which are not permitted when the associated handler is not available

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Applied to an element's property to indicate that the property's value is handled specially by a C++ class.
Applied to an element's property to indicate that select, update, and insert of the property's value are handled automatically by the platform.

ECProperty.description: Json string containing properties like URI

ECRelationshipClass.description: Element has a code which was issued by the given authority
Model has a code which was issued by the given authority

ECProperty.displayLabel: Global Origin
Sheet Size
Last Modified

ECProperty.description: Bits that indicate the status of the dependency. Satisfied=0, Failed=1, Deferred=128. Deferred and Failed bits can be OR'd together.
The priority of this dependency, relative to other EntityDrivesEntity instances. Note that EntityHasChildEntities dependencies always take priority over EntityDrivesEntity dependencies.
Format of the encoded texture data

ECProperty.displayLabel: JSON string consisting of array of SubCategoryOverrides
JSON string consisting of view flags, render mode, lighting settings, etc.
JSON string consisting of environment settings such as skybox.
JSON encoding of a ClipPlaneSet
Origin of the focus plane projected to the back plane
Extent in X on the focus plane in meters
Extent in Y on the focus plane in meters
Distance between front and back planes in meters
Camera eye point
Camera lens angle in degrees
Camera focus distance
Yaw component of the view direction in degrees
Pitch component of the view direction in degrees
Roll component of the view direction in degrees
Origin of the viewed volume on the lower, back, rear
Size of the view diagonal
Yaw component of the view direction in degrees
Pitch component of the view direction in degrees
Roll component of the view direction in degrees
Lower left corner of the viewed area.
Size of the view diagonal
Rotation angle in degrees of the viewed area.

ECProperty.description: The name of the Category to assign to instances of this component. Must not be null.
The name of the CodeAuthority to use then assigning Codes to instances of this component. May be null.
The name of the script to execute in order to create a variation of the component. May be null if the component is based on persistent geometry. In that case, Model must not be null.
The name of the model that the component definition uses to hold the persistent geometry and other data such as constraints. May be null for components that generate their geometry from scratch.
The names of the properties that are the main inputs to the component's element generator script.
The definition and default values for all of the ScriptOnlyParameters ad hoc properties that each instance must have.

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Provides information about a property that plays the role of a parameter to a component's solver.

ECProperty.description: Indicates if the parameter may be varied for individual instances or if it is fixed for all instances of a particular variation. Possible values: Variation or Instance.
